column1: SELECT IF(eventId='333mbf', REPLACE(scramble, '\n', '|'), scramble) AS `scramble`, scrambles.id, scrambles.competition_id, scrambles.event_id, scrambles.group_id, scrambles.is_extra, scrambles.round_type_id, scrambles.scramble_num FROM scrambles
